ability.name: Co-Pilot
ability.text: While you are docked, your carrier ship has your pilot ability in addition to its own.

pilots.name: Autopilot Drone
pilots.caption: Set to Blow
pilots.text: Sometimes, manufacturer's warnings are made to be broken.

ability.name: Rigged Energy Cells
ability.text: During the System Phase, if you are not docked, lose 1 [Charge]. At the end of the Activation Phase, if you have 0 [Charge], you are destroyed. Before you are removed, each ship at range 0-1 suffers 1 [Critical Hit] damage.

pilots.name: L3-37

pilots.ability: If you are not shielded, decrease the difficulty of your bank ([Bank Left] and [Bank Right]) maneuvers.

pilots.name: Outer Rim Pioneer
pilots.caption: Skillful Outlaw
pilots.ability: Friendly ships at range 0-1 can perform attacks at range 0 of obstacles.
